original: Lindström, Henning, lektor, Kalmar, f. 1/9/06 i Bräkne-Hoby, Blek. 1., av Axel L. o. Amanda Nicolaidotter. G. 1. 40 m. Gunhild Strindfors, d. 44; 2. 46 m. ’sem:lär. Ruth Håkansson. Barn: Lars f. 43. — Stud:ex. i Lund 31, teol. fil. ex. där 33, teol. kand. 37, teol. Hc. 42, disp. f. gr. 44, provår i Lund o. prästv. f. Lunds stift s. å. Doc. v. Lunds univ. 44, tf. prof. v. Åbo akad. 46. Timlär. i Karlskrona samt vik. ämneslär. v. Malmö komm. mel-lansk. 40, lär. v. Malmö borgarsk. 41, v. Lunds h. folksk. 42-44, e. adj. i Hässleholm 45, lektor i kristend :kun-sk. v. Kalmar folksk :sem. sed. 45. Prästerl. förordn. i Bräkne-Hoby förs. 45-46. Skr.: Skapelse o. frälsn. i Me-lanchtons teologi.
translated: Lindström, Henning, lecturer, Kalmar, b. 1/9/06 in Bräkne-Hoby, Blekinge county. Son of Axel L. and Amanda Nicolaidotter. Married 1st in 1940 to Gunhild Strindfors, who passed away in 1944; 2nd in 1946 to Ruth Håkansson, a seminary teacher. Children: Lars, born in 1943. Henning completed his secondary education in Lund in 1931, obtained a bachelor's degree in theology there in 1933, a theology licentiate degree in 1937, a theology doctorate in 1942, and was appointed as a lecturer in 1944. He served as an acting professor at Åbo Academy in 1946. Henning worked as an hourly teacher in Karlskrona and substitute subject teacher in Malmö from 1940, as a teacher at Malmö Business School in 1941, at Lund Higher Elementary School from 1942 to 1944, as an auxiliary clergyman in Hässleholm in 1945, and as a lecturer in Christian education at Kalmar Teacher Training College since 1945. He served as a clergyman in Bräkne-Hoby parish from 1945 to 1946. Henning's notable work is "Creation and Salvation in Melanchthon's Theology".

publication.name: Creation and Salvation in Melanchthon's Theology
